name: Circus Tesserae Deluxe
description:
Updated version of Circus Tesserae, a game made in 50 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice".  Play in your browser, or on your phone!

Circus Tessarae is a game of juggling dice. Click and drag to swipe through the dice. This will keep them in the air, and rotate them. Get them in the right orientation, knock them into barrels, avoid nasty bombs, and be wary of inverted dice!

Notes

  • If running on mobile, make sure the game opens in portrait mode
  • The order of dice at the bottom of the screen does not matter
  • If a dice at the bottom of the screen have no value,  orientations
  • Bombs will only explode if you swipe through them
